description:
Hierarchical collapsible menu
```$ npm install grommet-controls\n
import { VerticalMenu } from 'grommet-controls';\n
<VerticalMenu items={...} onSelect={...} />
```

buttonClass.description: Custom class to use for the button instead of RoutedButton
buttonClass.name: buttonClass

expandAll.description: If specified, will expand all items with chidren
expandAll.name: expandAll

onSelect.description: Function that will be called when the user selects a menu item
onSelect.name: onSelect

search.description: If specified, will filter the items by the search terms
search.name: search
